basic.Target Organism: PD:Aspergillus niger (MIC=12.1 µg/ml), Aspergillus versicolor (MIC<5.0 µg/ml), Fusarium moniliforme (MIC=21.7 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum (MIC>100 µg/ml), Fusarium solani (MIC=12.1 µg/ml), Neurospora crassa (MIC=0.04 µg/ml), Saccharomyces cerevisae (MIC>100 µg/ml), Trichophyton mentagrophytes (MIC>100 µg/ml).PD+:Aspergillus niger (MIC=7.4 µg/ml), Fusarium moniliforme (MIC=33.2 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=100 µg/ml), Fusarium solani (MIC=79.2 µg/ml), Neurospora crassa (MIC=0.05 µg/ml).NOTE:PD+:potato dextrose medium supplemented with 1 mM CaCl2.
